name: In The Search For: Revenge (itch)
description:
In The Search For: Revenge is a short unpolished game that shows the lengths a person is willing to go to in order to get revenge.

It doesn't have a lot of colors, variety in gameplay nor sounds.

but I'm hoping that if you take the time to  understood the story you will come to really appreciate why this game is the way it is.

Enjoy. 

Trailer : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d-JfWbJQ8GY

Note: This game may need middle to upper middle hardware for it to run smoothly.
